a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child mortality rate by household wealth, South Africa
The estimated share of newborns who die before age five, by household wealth quintile. Shown are the richest,
middle, and poorest fifths of the population.
Data source: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (2024)
